law.catch_line: Return of purchase price or supplying of new mobile home in lieu of repairs.
law.text: If the defect is not corrected pursuant to KRS 367.735 the manufacturer shall, at its option, return the price paid by the seller less any diminution in value due to abuse by the owner, or the action of a third party or shall supply a new mobile home of the same model and year at the owner's home site which shall be warranted as though originally purchased.
